alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 15 at 11:59AM MDT until March 15 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 3 PM today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow is expected in open and exposed areas where snowpack exists, mainly around Jeffrey City. * MEASURED WIND GUSTS THROUGH 2 AM..73 mph on the south side of Casper, 71 mph along Interstate 25 at Hat Six road.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
